page.title: 01Cam Valley,Mendips.Summary.
page.content: The area lies in the{Mendip Hills}in the{County of Avon.}The{Cam Brook}runs through the centre of the area.The villages of{Paulton,Timsbury}and{High {Littleton}are situated on high land above the valley.The largest of these villages is{Paulton,}which is almost the size of a small town.The hamlet of{Radford}is situated in the S.W. of the area. The area is mainly agricultural,with dairy farming predominating.There is a large industrial centre in{Paulton, with printing and shoe manufacture there.Industry was formerly based on coal mining,much evidence of which remains. The area is criss_crossed by narrow lanes bordered by hedgerows.The old field patterns still exist. {
